description: Returns a list of the custom action targets in Security Hub in your account.

parameters.name: ActionTargetArns
parameters.description: A list of custom action target ARNs for the custom action targets to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required for pagination. On your first call to the DescribeActionTargets operation, set the value of this parameter to NULL. For subsequent calls to the operation, to continue listing data, set the value of this parameter to the value returned from the previous response.

nested_items.name: ActionTargets
nested_items.description: A list of ActionTarget objects. Each object includes the ActionTargetArn, Description, and Name of a custom action target available in Security Hub.

nested_items.name: ActionTargetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the target action.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the action target.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the target action.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to request the next page of results.
